actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide student loan borrowers with a choice of lender for loan consolidation.
short_title: Consolidation Student Loan Flexibility Act of 2002

summary.text: Consolidation Student Loan Flexibility Act of 2002 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow student loan borrowers to choose a lender for loan consolidation. (Eliminates the requirement that: (1) the consolidation loan lender already hold an outstanding student loan of the borrower; or (2) the borrower certify to having sought and been unable to obtain a consolidation loan with income-sensitive repayment terms from any holders of the outstanding loans selected for consolidation.)

titles.title: Consolidation Student Loan Flexibility Act of 2002
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide student loan borrowers with a choice of lender for loan consolidation.
